sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog
    :model-value="modelValue"
    @update:model-value="$emit('update:modelValue', $event)"
    max-width="500"
  >
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title>保存为模板</v-card-title>
      <v-card-text>
        <v-form ref="form">
          <v-text-field
            v-model="formData.name"
            label="模板名称"
            required
            :rules="[v => !!v || '请输入模板名称']"
          ></v-text-field>
          <v-textarea
            v-model="formData.description"
            label="模板描述"
            rows="3"
          ></v-textarea>
        </v-form>
      </v-card-text>
      <v-card-actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          color="grey-darken-1"
          variant="text"
          @click="$emit('update:modelValue', false)"
        >
          取消
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          variant="text"
          @click="handleSave"
          :loading="saving"
        >
          保存
        </v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'

const props = defineProps({
  modelValue: {
    type: Boolean,
    required: true
  }
})

const emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue', 'save'])

const form = ref(null)
const saving = ref(false)
const formData = ref({
  name: '',
  description: ''
})

const handleSave = async () => {
  const { valid } = await form.value.validate()
  if (!valid) return
  
  saving.value = true
  try {
    emit('save', formData.value)
    formData.value = { name: '', description: '' }
    emit('update:modelValue', false)
  } finally {
    saving.value = false
  }
}
</script>
